title: Grade Ebook Seller
description: Create a program that determines the grade of an ebook seller based on the number of ebooks sold. The grade is determined by the following conditions: if the seller sold less than 50 ebooks, they get an F grade; if they sold between 50 and 100 ebooks, they get a D grade; if they sold between 101 and 200 ebooks, they get a C grade; if they sold between 201 and 400 ebooks, they get a B grade; and if they sold more than 400 ebooks, they get an A grade.
